org.apache.accumulo.shell.mock

Class MockShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.shell.ShellOptions
      • org.apache.accumulo.shell.Shell
        • org.apache.accumulo.shell.mock.MockShell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeywordExecutable
    Deprecated. 
    since 1.8.0; use MiniAccumuloCluster or a standard mock framework instead.

    @Deprecated
public class MockShell
extends Shell
    An Accumulo Shell implementation that allows a developer to attach an InputStream and Writer to the Shell for testing purposes.
